D≈àa 21. 10. 2025 o 11:56, Tech Support <support@zooza.online> nap√≠sal:

Dobry den pan Frimmer,

Samotne automaticke parovanie funguje nasledovne:

- Vo Vasej banke nastavite pre zvoleny ucet - Volajme ho UCET 1, emailovu notifikaciu o novej prijatej uhrade

- Takato notifikacia pride potom ku nam do Zoozy a ta "pohlada" ci pre dany variabilny symbol existuje registracia.

- Ak ano, platbu ku nej zapise a to bez ohladu na to, ci tato registracia ma nastaveny fakturacny profil ... [TRUNCATED]

Dobry den pan Frimer,

Presiel som si tie registracie, ktore spominate a vsetky maju nastaveny korektny fakturacny profil. Skusali sme si to teda testovat na nasich uctoch a platobne instrukcie boli zakazdym odoslane korektne. Mrzi ma, ze tato situacia nastala. Pri kontrole dalsich registracii vidno, ze problem nenastava vzdy a aj vzhladom na to, ze od inych klientov sme taketo hlasenie nezaznamenali, vyzera to tak, ze sa to tyka len tychto konkretnych registracii. Preskumame to este blizsie, no nateraz som spravil to, ze som skontroloval nastavenia na registraciach a vsade je momentalne nastaveny korektny fakturacny profil. Do aplikacie sme pridali rozsirene logovanie, aby bolo mozne presnejsie dohladat, kde doslo k zamene, preto Vas chcem poprosit, ak sa situacia zopakuje, dajte nam prosim vediet.

Urobime vsetko preto aby sa situacia vyriesila.

Zaroven co sa tyka druhej otazky - na vsetkych kurzoch momentalne mate nastavene manualne schvalovanie neskorych registracii. Preto je potrebne platobny plan vytvarat manualne. Ak chcete aby sa vytvaral automaticky, je potrebne na kurzoch toto nastavenie prepnut na automaticke schvalovanie. Ak chcete, mozem Vam to hromadne upravit na vsetkych kurzoch (nastavuje sa to v casti Platba a cena)

Dakujem za trpezlivost,

na zaklade komunikacie a dohody s Mirkou este zo zaciatku integracie a nastavovania Zoozy, kde sme si zadefinovali, ze nastavenim clenskeho poplatku je potrebne mat nastavene vyrocie k 1.dnu v mesiaci a nasledne nastavit vystavenie splatok 10dni pred splatnostou - teda dnom vyrocia.

Takto su nastavene vase offline ucty, takto je potrebne mat nastavene aj online ucet.

- aku sumu maju neskore registracie mat

nasledne, ak povolite neskore registracie (automaticky alebo manualne), tak si vyberate, co sa udeje s alikvotnou ciastkou.
Tam hovorite o tom, aka cena sa vypocita. Nastavujete to rovnako v casti Cena a platba

System nema moznost zmeny alikvotnej ciastky automaticky po nejakom datume, cize nevie povedat, ze prihlaseni po prvej hodine maju mat este sumu celeho kurzu ale prihlaseni po druhej hodine uz maju mat inu sumu, toto dokazete vsak riesit manualnym prepnutim v case kedy to potrebujete.

subject: What s up for Bussiness
classification: Issue - Requirement to test a set up

threads.content:
Hi Viorica,

thank you for reaching out. Currently Whatsapp For Business is in limited Beta version. This means that for now we offer this functionality to selected customers for free. After we tweak everything so that it works great, we will release this for everyone as part of Zooza Pro package.

If you want we can include you in this limited Beta version, so that you can try out how the experience look like and what it brings to you as a business owner.

What Limited Beta program means: The functionality works, messages are being sent but we're mostly looking for feedback on how to use the service and what is the overall experience with the integration within Zooza. So this does not mean that your customers would receive wrong information or anything like that.

WhatsApp works a bit different than emails, but we do believe that this is the future of communicating with parents.

To sum up what you can do with WhatsApp For Business at this moment:

- Zooza will send automatic messages for your customers (just like with the emails) - Registration confirmations, Lesson reminders, Payment reminders etc.

- You can communicate one on one with your customers, but they need to initiate the conversation. So whenever customer sends you a message, this message will appear in Zooza and you can have a chat with them. You can also receive voice messages, pictures and message reactions.

We're currently at stage, where most of automated communication is already in place and we mostly need to finish manual sending of bulk messages via WhatsApp.

To be included in this program, you would need a new phone number that has hever been registered with Whatsapp, Facebook account, WhatsApp For Business account (this can be created during the onboarding process).

Please let me know how do you want to proceed further.

We'll be happy to include you in the limited beta version.

Many thanks

With [SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Hi Viorica,

first of all, we wish you Merry Christmas and Happy New Year.

Second of all, i would like to ask you if you had opportunity to think about proceeding further with Whatsapp for Business in Zooza.

let us know so we can include you to our limited beta version.

thank you

Katarina

Dobry den,

Dakujeme velmi pekne za podrobnu analyzu. Niektore veci su dosledkom zmeny architektury aplikacie (napriklad polozka skupiny bola podriadena polozke kurzy, preto ten preklik na kurzy fungoval), niektore su zasa dosledkom povodneho nastavenia roli, ktore sa menilo. Kedysi lektori (nielen hlavni ale aj normalni) mali pristup do zobrazenia kurzu (normalni lektori mali pristup len na citanie, hlavni aj na zapis). Na zaklade poziadaviek klientov sme postupne jednotlive roly predefinovali ale uz sme ich uplne nedotiahli aj v praxi.

Body 1, 2 a 3 sme vyriesili. Pri bode tri, bude potrebne zmenit rolu daneho lektora na inu a nasledne vratit rolu hlavneho lektora.

Bod 4 - hlavny lektor nema obmedzenu komunikaciu ani pohlad na objednavky. Tu mame chybu v dokumentacii a budeme ju musiet upravit.

Co sa tyka skrytia platieb pre rolu hlavneho lektora, toto by sme vedeli dorobit.

Dobry den Barbora,

Ano, hlavny lektor uvidi vsetky skupiny. Na pozadi vo vnutri systemu sa kazda rola sklada z takzvanych permissions - povoleni. Zakaznici nemaju ziadne a majitelia ich maju vsetky. Pre citanie a zapis do skupin maju vsetky lektorske role povolenie typu: "Iba moje" co znamena, ze maju povolenie na citanie iba skupin, na ktorych su lektori. Ale hlavny lektor by mal dostat povolenie typu: "Vsetky" a prave v tomto bola chyba. Ked teda danemu lektorovi zmenite rolu na akukolvek inu a vratite mu rolu do stavu hlavny lektor, zmeni sa mu toto povolenie z "Iba moje" na "Vsetky". Nie je teda potrebne ziadne dalsie nastavenie.

K skrytiu platieb: urobili by sme to urcite ako nastavenie, pretoze niektori klienti to chcu tak a ini zas inak. Vo vseobecnosti povazujte Zoozu za svoj softver. Sme tu pre to aby ste mohli lepsie podnikat a Zoozu rozvijame z 90% prave na zaklade vstupov od Vas zakaznikov. Ak potrebujete do aplikacie nieco pridat, alebo zmenit, nevahajte nam o tom napisat. Vzdy sa snazime maximalne vyjst v ustrety a hoci niekedy musime zadanie upravit, aby bolo aplikovatelne pre co najvacsiu skupinu zakaznikov, alebo v ramci priorit spadne nizsie, v konecnom dosledku Vasim poziadavkam typicky vyjdeme v ustrety. 

Hovorim to takto preto, pretoze vsetok vyvoj, ktory na aplikacii vykonavame je uz zahrnuty v poplatku, ktory za Zoozu platite. Ziadne dalsie peniaze si od zakaznikov za vyvoj nepytame.

Konkretne tato zmena nie je zasadne casovo narocna, vedeli by sme ju realizovat v priebehu najblizsich tyzdnov.

Dobry den pan Pach,

ako sme sa dohodli, posielam Vam kroky pre nastavenie permanentiek.

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cntre0dJZOxqmN613n-bmG9SSPxBMjbEdPsBE4Op_hA/edit?tab=t.0

Permanentky je mozne predavat dvoma sposobmi:

Cez registracny formular

Cez profil klienta

Permanentku teda vytvarate podla toho, kde ju chcete predavat. Oba postupy som Vam spisala, kazdy ma vlastnu zalozku, aby ste mohol ist postupne.
Rozdiel medzi nastavenim permanenky pre registracny formular a profil je v tom, ze produkt Permanentka pre registracny formular ma pod sebou poloziek kolko potrebujete - teda 5 vstupova, 10 vstupova, 20 vstupova,.... vsetko ide pod jeden produkt.
Na rozdiel od Profilu, kde je potrebne vytvorit tolko produktov kolko mam vstupovych permanentiek - poloziek. Teda jeden produkt = jedna polozka.
Rozpisala som Vam to po obrazovkach tak aby som Vas previedla vsetkymi krokmi, verim, ze to bude pre Vas zrozumitelne.

Rovnako tak ste schopny nastavit formu, akou sa zakaznik na termin prihlasuje:

Bez permanentky - za vytvoreny dlh, ktory V√°m nasledne uhrad√≠ prevodom alebo v hotovosti - takto fungujete teraz

S permanentkou¬†

Ak permanentku m√° zak√∫pen√∫ aj uhraden√∫ - vstup z permanentky moze vyuzit iba vtedy, ak ma permanentku zaplatenu, inak si vstup zabezpeci na platbu prevodom

Ak permanentku ma zakupenu ale nema ju uhradenu - mozte sa rozhodnut dovolit zakaznikovi cerpat si vstupy z permanentky este predtym, ako permanentku uhradi

Iba s permanentkou - mate moznost nastavit si aj to, ze do urciteho konkretneho kurzu sa Vam zakaznici neprihlasia na dlh (teda na platbu v hotovosti ƒçc prevodom) ale iba ak maju permanentku - toto nastavenie sa robi na kurze, v casti dochadzka - nastavenie Vyzadovat platny vstup na prihlasenie na termin

Verim, ze Vam takyto manual pomoze vytvorit si produkty na mieru a budu Vam sluzit pre zjednodusenie zbierania platieb¬†

pekny vecer.
Katarina

Cauko Silvi, tam by QR kod mal byt. No treba skontrolovat v sablone, ze ci tam nie je chyba. Napriklad moze byt nejaka medzera tam alebo nejaky iny neviditelny znak. Najlepsie co mozes, je otvorit tu sablonu, vymazat z textu tu znacku a napisat ju este raz. A teda je to platena skusobna hodina? System sa zachova takto: - Ak nerozpozna znacku¬† - necha ju na pokoji - Ak rozpozna znacku ale nema pre nu ziadnu hodnotu (napriklad registracia nema dlznu sumu) - nezobrazi nic (neuvidis ani znacku a ani obsah) - Ak rozpozna znacku a ma pre nu obsah - ukaze obsah Kedze tebe znacku nerozpoznalo priciny mozu byt dve: Znacka nie je povolena (ale tato by mala byt), alebo je napisana tak, ze ju system nevie precitat. Napriklad pri ibanoch alebo cenach sa stava, ze ich zakaznici vybolduju na dva krat a system vidi toto: *|IBAN|* pricom ty ako clovek vidis: *IBAN|*. [SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

V principe nie je rozdiel medzi individualnou a skupinovou vyucbou. V tomto pripade predpokladam pojde o skupinu, ktora nie je dostupna pre online registraciu. Postup je teda v zasade rovnaky akoby ste vytvarali skupinovy kurz - nastavite aktivne platobne sablony, urcite lektora, lokalitu (v tomto pripade online) a vsetky ostatne bezne nastavenia na urovni skupiny. Dobry den,

Takto to nefunguje, potom nebudete vediet, ktore terminy su navyse a ktore regulerne. Pokial je dieta v skupinovom kurze, neviete mu pridelit lekcie navyse bez toho aby tie lekcie navyse nedostali aj ostatni ludia v tej skupine.

Je to rovnake ako keby to dieta chodilo do skoly. Ma rozvrh na anglictinu v utorky v triede. A ak mu chcete pridat doucovanie anglictiny aj v piatok, potom je to samostatny individualny rozvrh, za ktory sa samostatne plati a samostatne sa vyhodnocuje ci je to doucovanie uspesne alebo nie. Nemixovali by ste tieto dve veci dohromady, preto najcistejsie je vytvorit k tomuto samostatnu registraciu. Pokial chcete, aby rodic nemal dalsi variabilny symbol na uhradu, mozete obe registracie prepojit tak aby sa platby spracuvali iba na tej hlavnej registracii a spravovat si dlh potom na nej.

Odpoved zavisi od toho, co chcete dosiahnut:

1) Zmenili ste lokalitu, kde sa kurz bude konat?

2) Zmenila sa adresa lokality, ktoru mate v Zooze zapisanu?

V prvom pripade, si v Aktivity > Skupiny odfiltrujte vsetky skupiny, ktorych sa zmena tyka. Zakliknite checkbox nad zoznamom a kliknite na hromadnu upravu. Tam mozete zmenit lokalitu.

V druhom pripade v Nastaveniach > Lokality upravte adresu lokality tak aby korespondovala s realitou.

We have successfully integrated the Zooza app with our WordPress site using the provided API key and secret key. We have also implemented the code snippets for all app pages, including:
Booking form
Calendar / Schedule
Profile
View videos
Sales form
Map
Each page has been set up individually; however, it appears that there is no option to customise the design of the widgets. We would appreciate your guidance on configuring the design settings and also assistance with setting up the schedule for our programs. If we can schedule an online meeting to complete the integration process.
We are contacting on behalf of:¬†Soundplay International Ltd

Thanks
Dislo London

Hi,
Thanks a lot for the update and for the great work on the integration ‚Äì it‚Äôs really good to hear that Zooza is already connected on all key pages.
Regarding your questions:

1. Widget design & styling

The design and customisation of the widgets is handled via your own CSS directly on the website.

You can find an overview of the main options and examples here:

https://docs.zooza.online/widgets/#customisation

From there, you can override the default styles (fonts, colours, buttons, spacing, etc.) using CSS rules on your WordPress theme or page builder. If needed, we can also point you to the specific classes for each widget type.
2. Programme schedules

The schedules are managed inside Zooza admin (Programmes ‚Üí Timetables ).

Once the timetables are created and published there, the widgets on your website will automatically display the correct dates, times and locations.
3. Free consultation / call

We‚Äôre happy to offer a free technical consultation to review everything together, including:

checking each widget and the current setup on your pages

advising on CSS customisation options

helping you configure the schedules for your programmes

answering any API / integration questions

You can book a meeting at a time that suits you here:¬†¬†https://meetings-eu1.hubspot.com/zooza

or send me a couple of time options and I‚Äôll send an invite.
Thanks again for the great work so far ‚Äì looking forward to getting the last details finished together.

Hi Marius,

thank you for your message, will take a take a closer look and will get back to you soon.¬†

Hi Marius,
thank you for your message and for the example.
The key thing to know is:

when you use a payment method ‚Äúafter N classes‚Äù,

the debt is not created immediately when you mark attendance,

the system creates the due amount during the night (after the N classes are reached).

On the payment template detail for that registration, you can already see the amount that is being accumulated from attendance. This is the amount that will become due once N classes are fulfilled (whether N is 1, 4, etc.).
So now, if you:

set the payment method with N classes,

mark the child as Attended,

immediately the debt increase in payment plan

But the debt itself is created the next day, (after N / or period is fulfilled)

If anything still looks strange after that, please send us one specific link to the registration you are checking and we‚Äôll have another look.
Best regards,

Dobry den Igor,

Subor je naozaj prazdny. Ked sme skusali urobit export za posledne dva mesiace, vsetko zafungovalo a subor bol korektne vytvoreny. V poznamke, ku generovanemu suboru, ktory ste poslali su prehodene datumy od do (od novembra do januara a nie od januara do novembra). Je mozne, ze to je problem, pre ktory Vam export nezafungoval. Skuste prosim nastavit datumy korektne a vyskusajte export este raz. Ak by to nezafungovalo, skuste prosim export nie za cely rok, ale povedzme za kvartal. Export do Pohody je citlivy na specialne znaky. Napriklad ak by poznamka alebo nejaky iny text obsahoval emoji alebo nejaky iny podobny znak, export nezbehne, lebo Pohoda taketo znaky importovat nevie. Bolo by teda potom dolezite zistit, kde to pada, ktora registracia tento problem sposobuje a manualne opravit fakturacne data. Ale verim, ze toto bude krajne riesenie a spravne zadanie datumov pomoze.

cenu v systeme dokazete upravit ako na kurze tak aj na skupine.
V zakladnych nastaveniach kurzu alebo skupiny je cast Cena a platba, kde danu sumu upravujete.

Je na Vas a Vasom biznisovom rozhodnuti, ako peniaze zbierate, ci jednorazovo alebo na splatky. V pripade splatok tomu prosim nezabudnite prisposobit nastavenie, jednotkovu cenu a splatkove sablony.

Dobry den Katarina,

V prvom rade nas mrzi, ze je system pre Vas hroza. Snazime sa o to aby boli instrukcie jasne a zrozumitelne. Ak je nieco s cim mozeme pohnut aby to hroza nebola, radi privitame spatnu vazbu.

Co sa Vasho konkretneho problemu tyka, spociva v tom, ze momentalne, nemate nastaveny sposob vyberania penazi a preto Vam system neukazuje moznost nastavit cenu. Vid priloha.¬†

V case ked ste nastavovali prvy krat kurzy, v aplikacii este nebola moznost vyuzivat clenske a vo vseobecnosti, velmi vela nastaveni cien, ktore uz dnes v systeme su. Preto je dolezite, skontrolovat si nastavenia a zodpovedat par zakladnych otazok:

1) Chcete vyberat peniaze jednorazovo alebo v splatkach.

2) Ak jednorazovo, treba na urovni kurzu (vidno to na prilozenom obrazku) zakliknut volbu Jednorazovo. Nasledne bude mozne nastavit cenu kurzu.

3) Ak v splatkach, je potrebne si vybrat, ci chcete vyberat takzvane Kurzovne alebo Clensky poplatok. Rozdiel je popisany priamo v aplikacii ale v zasade ide o to, ze pri kurzovnom sa rozdeli pozadovana suma na splatky. Napriklad cely kurz stoji 200 eur a chcete platbu mesacne tak, system rozdeli tych 200 eur na tolko splatok kolko mesiacov trva kurz. Ak chcete vyberat clensky poplatok ten funguje inak - Poviete si kolko chcete aby system mesacne/kvartalne/rocne od zakaznika pytal a pokym skupina neskonci, system bude opakovane peniaze od zakaznikov vyzadovat, vzdy ked pride vyrocie splatky.

Potom je este mozne ist do rozsirenych nastaveni a povedat systemu ako ma pracovat s prihlaseniami po zaciatku kurzu atd.

No a ako posledne je dolezite spomenut, ze nastavenia na urovni kurzu sa aplikuju na vsetky skupiny. Ak je potrebne niektoru skupinu nacenit inak, je to mozne na urovni skupin.

V pripade, ak potrebujete s nastavenim pomoct, ozvite sa prosim a dohodneme si stretnutie.

Dear Emma,

thank you for reaching to us. The error you're seeing is caused by instructor's rate being set in the app's settings, assigned to a session, but no instructor has in fact assigned any value for any rate thus failing to display the expected payout for the session. The expected result should look like the one in the attached screenshot. We've fixed this and word "false" should no longer appear if this situation happens.

If you really want to take full advantage of Instructor rates and be able to calculate wages for instructors, you would need to edit the instructor's profile and assign a value for any given rate.

This is how it works:

- You can set up two types of rates - Fixed or Timed. Fixed means that regardless of actual session duration, instructor's reward/payout will be the same. Timed means that the payout will be calculated based on the actual duration of the session.

Example - Fixed rate:

Rate name: Senior

Assigned payout to instructor: 10‚Ç¨

Instructor is teaching 2 sessions, one is 60 minutes, second is 120 minutes
Payout: 20‚Ç¨

Example - Timed rate:

Rate name: Senior (60 minutes)

Assigned payout to instructor: 10‚Ç¨ (meaning that for every 60 minutes, the payout should be ten euro)

Instructor is teaching 2 sessions, one is 60 minutes, second is 120 minutes

Payout: 30‚Ç¨ (ten for the first session, and 20 for the second session as it took 120 minutes)

So essentially, timed rate will always be calculated on the actual amount of hours instructor spent teaching, whilst fixed rate will only work with count of sessions.

If you have any further questions, do not hesitate to contact us.

Dobry den Michal,

Mate viacero moznosti a kazda zavisi od toho, co chcete dosiahnut. V principe ale plati, ze co ucastnik, to registracia. To znamena, ze ak mate situaciu kedy kurz navstevuje naraz rodic aj dieta, je potrebne aby kazdy mal svoju vlastnu registraciu. Kazda registracia ma dve role:

- Kupujuceho (klienta) - Toto je osoba zodpovedna za nakup registracie a na nu sa primarne odosiela vsetka komunikacia. Zaroven kazdy unikatny kupujuci (unikatny podla emailu) je aktivy zakaznik a teda spada do poctu aktivnych zakaznikov na zaklade ktorych potom platite za Zoozu

- Ucastnik - Toto je osoba, ktora sa fyzicky zucastnuje kurzu. Nepocita sa priamo medzi klientov a ani sa nezapocitava do poctu aktivnych zakaznikov.

V pripade, kedy mate rodica Petra, ktory chce navstevovat kurz so svojim synom Jozefom, potom by ste mali mat v systeme dve registracie:

Registracia 1: Kupujuci Peter, Ucastnik Peter

Registracia 2: Kupujuci Peter, Ucastnik Jozef

Nasledne je potrebne sa rozhodnut, ci chcete aby boli obe registracie uhradzane samostatne, alebo spolu. Ak samostatne, netreba robit nic, ak spolu, potom je potrebne obe registracie prepojit (robi sa to na detaile registracie) a pri prepajani v poslednom kroku sa Vas system opyta, ci chcete aby boli platby spracovavane iba hlavnou registraciou.

V pripade ak to robi zakaznik priamo cez registracny formular sam, Zooza to urobi automaticky. V pripade ak robite registracie manualne, je potrebne to nastavit rucne.

V hociktorom momente viete na kazdej registracii zmenit ci uz Kupujuceho alebo Klienta. V pripade ak ste napriklad vyrobili registraciu pre Petra a je na nej aj ucastnikom a chcete Petra zmenit za Jozefa, staci na detaile registracie v karte Ucastnik kliknut na zmenit a bud si vyberiete z existujucich Ucastnikov alebo vytvorite noveho.

Verim, ze som Vam trochu osvetlil ake su moznosti, pripadne ak je treba nieco dovysvetlit, alebo chcete poradit s konkretnou situaciu, nevahajte a napiste.

Dobry den,

prosim o link na skupiny korych sa to tyka. a pipadne aj klientov, ktori hlasia, ze sa im dany termin nezobrazuje.

dakujem

Katarina

Dobry den,

Vybrali ste pomerne inovativne riesenie pre nahradnu hodinu. Vytvorili ste samostatne jednorazove skupiny s jednym terminom. A to je prave dovod, pre ktory sa termin neposkytuje na nahradnu hodinu. Zooza blokuje vyber nahradnych hodin v skupinach, ktore este nezacali. Najskor styri dni pred zaciatkom skupiny sa umoznuje do nich posielat ludi na nahradky.

Nastastie riesenie je pomerne jednoduche. V skupine zmente zaciatok skupiny z 15. 12. na 5. 12 (Detail skupiny > Nastavenia) a termin sa zacne zobrazovat.

Dobry den

Je to trosku inak. To ci notifikacie odchadzaju, je urcene v casti Online registracia pre kazdy kurz. Tam mozete tuto funkciu zapnut alebo vypnut. V pripade ak je funkcia zapnuta tak zakaznici sa mozu sami z odberu tychto emailov odhlasit a to je to co vidite na registracii.

Z nasho pohladu ide o jednu z najpouzivanejsich funkcii Zoozy. Ludia sa na nu spoliehaju do takej miery, ze ked im email nepride, neobtazuju sa ani prist na hodinu. Z 500.000 registracii, ktore v systeme mame si zasielanie notifikacii vyplo asi iba okolo 6.000 ludi, co hovori samo za seba.

Teda ak Vam mozem poradit, vyskusajte si tuto funkciu a myslim, ze uvidite, ze je naozaj uzitocna. Jeden z mnohych benefitov je napriklad aj ten, ze sa zakaznici mozu odhlasit z hodiny a vy sa tak viete zariadit. Napriklad ak mate na hodine 10 deti a z nich sa 7 odhlasi kvoli chorobe, viete sa rozhodnut ci termin rovno nezrusite alebo nepresuniete a usetrite tak naklady na lektora.

subject: Platform not working properly
classification: Issue - Requirement to test a set up

threads.content:
Dear Bianca,

Thank you for reaching out. The issues you're experiencing with registration not updating are most likely due to caching. We are continuously adding more and more cached data so that the platform will become more responsive and quicked to work with. Cached response essentially means that once you open a registration (for example) it becomes stored in memory and consecutive calls to that same registration should be much much quicker. However it may result in situation that you are describing. We will investigate these scenarios and we'll make adjustments so that you see changed data immediatelly and not after a delay.

As for payments taking long time to appear can you please specify whether you talking about Sales and Payments > Payments overview or Payments page on Registration's detail? We did not experience any slowdown in the traffic today, but we can certainly have a look at your specific profile to see whether there is any issue with the data or not.

Many thanks

With warm [SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Thank you so much for the response.¬†

Dobry den,

Po tom, co prideme na to, kde sa tieto data rozkmotrili ano, ale v principe toto nie je udaj podla ktoreho Vam fakturujeme/pocitame aktivnych klientov. Ten najdete v casti Reporty -> Statistiky. Tam sa pocitaju realne aktivni pouzivatelia. Opat len vysvetlim, preco v tom moze byt rozdiel:

1) Statistiky - Vzdy mate aktualne cislo za aktualny mesiac aktualizovane kazdy den.

2) Zoznam klientov - Obsahuje predvypocitany zoznam aktivnych klientov. Tento zoznam sa priebezne aktualizuje, ale nie je relevantny voci fakturacii.

Pripodobnim to k uctovnemu systemu. Ak mate v uctovnom systeme zalozenu firmu/odberatela a vystavite nanho fakturu a nasledne tohto odberatela zmazete, faktura ostane vystavena a v zozname faktur uvidite ze mate odberatela X ale v zozname odberatelov uz nebude (lebo je vymazany). Toto je obdobna situacia. Fakturujeme Vas za unikatny email, ktory mate v databaze, pokial ten email ma nejaku registraciu, ktora este neskoncila alebo nahradnu hodinu v buducnosti. Zoznam klientov zobrazuje zoznam klientov, ktori maju nejaku registraciu alebo objednavku uz vystavenu a informacia o tom, ci je klient aktivny sa dotahuje z registracie a nie zo zoznamu klientov. V teorii by to malo sediet 1:1, ale v praxi sa tak ako aj vo Vasom pripade moze stat, ze na datovej urovni sa data nedosynchronizuju vsade uplne korektne.

Dakujem,

Martin

threads.content:
Ahoj Jani,

Funguje to tak, ze kazdy lektor ma kazdu sadzbu ale kazdy lektor moze mat inu odmenu za tuto sadzbu.

Cize v principe nastavis sadzbu napriklad: Lektor - Parkour,

pricom Jozko bude mat odmenu 10 eur za hodinu, Anezka 6 eur za hodinu a Ferko len 2 eur za hodinu.

Sadzba by mala byt rovnaka bez ohladu na to ci je dodatocny lektor alebo nie. Respektive - sadzba nie je vytvarana individualne na lektora. Aspon takto sme to cele dizajnovali, ale ak povies, ze ti to nevyhovuje, skusime to samozrejme nejak upravit.

Dakujem,

Martin

Proces je v nasledovny:¬†

- Po poslednej skusobnej hodine pri zapise dochadzky Vas system vyzve aby ste zaznacili do akej skupiny sa ma zakaznik zaregistrovat a pripadne mu mozete poslat aj osobnu pozvanku/poznamku.

- Nasledne ak je zapnuta automatizacia, system posle zakaznikovi email (do piatich minut od zaznacenia dochadzky)

To ci mate automatizaciu zapnutu vidite aj priamo na kazdej registracii, je tam vypisane, kedy aky email bol/bude poslany.

Ak sa Vam email neodoslal, pravdepodobne to bude preto, lebo nemate nastavenu prislusnu automatizaciu. Skuste pripadne poslat cislo registracie a preverime, ci nahodou nedoslo k nejakej chybe?

Dobry den,

Ide iba o zjednodusenie pri vytvarani novych skupin. Su firmy, ktore ponukaju skusobne hodiny iba v konkretnych lokalitach alebo specialnych pripadoch. Ak patrite medzi nich, ponechajte tuto volbu nezakliknutu. Ak naopak mate skusobne hodiny povolene vo vsetkych skupinach, zakliknite tuto volbu a automaticky kazda novovytvorena skupina bude zahrnuta v skusobnych hodinach.

[SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Dobry den,

V pripade ak chcete klienta zneaktivnit, uistite sa, ze jeho registracie su v stave "zrusena". V tom pripade system zakaznika zneaktivni. 

Podmienka pri aktivovani/deaktivovani klienta je, ze zakaznik musi mat platnu registraciu (stav registrovany alebo skusobna hodina) A ZAROVEN (nie alebo) byt v skupine, ktora este neskoncila, nezacala alebo ma nejaku nedocerpanu nahradnu hodinu. Ak ste teda zakaznikovi zrusili vsetky registracie, moze mat kludne aj desat nedocerpanych nahradnych hodin ale bude deaktivovany.

Prepocet aktivnych zakaznikov sa deje kazdy den po polnoci, preto zmena nie je okamzite vidiet. Zrusit narok na nahradne hodiny individualne pre jedneho klienta sa neda. Pripadne ak mate podozrenie, ze system eviduje zakaznika ako aktivneho a nemal by, poslite prosim jeho email a preverime to.

[SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Dobr√Ω de≈à,¬†

ƒéakujem za doplnenie - po dne≈°nom prepoƒçte u≈æ je klient neakt√≠vny.

tak≈æe ak teda registr√°ciu zru≈°√≠m, ≈°tudent automaticky str√°ca aj n√°rok na n√°hradn√© hodiny a klient sa st√°va neakt√≠vnym ak nem√° in√© akt√≠vne registr√°cie.. alebo bude ma≈• nejak√Ω pr√≠stup e≈°te k n√°hradn√Ωm hodin√°m ?¬†

budeme na na≈°ej strane prech√°dza≈• u≈æ takto dlh≈°ie "neakt√≠vnych" klientov, u ktor√Ωch vieme ≈æe n√°hradn√∫ hodinu u≈æ nevyu≈æij√∫ a sn√°ƒè sa n√°m to trochu preƒçist√≠....

ƒéakujem za pomoc,¬†
BZ

Dobry den,

Momentalne je v Zooze mozne ukoncit kurz dvoma sposobmi:

- Vymazanim registracie - Registracia sa strati z reportingu a klient k nej nema pristup

- Zrusenim registracie - Registracia ostava v reportingu (napriklad lektor za nu dostane zaplatene ak ju uz oducil) a klient ma limitovany pristup k takejto registracii

Zrusenie registracie sposobi, ze klient uz dalej s takouto registraciou nevie pracovat a teda ani vyuzivat nahradne hodiny. Preto je v aplikacii mozne naplanovat zrusenie registracie. Ak teda pride klient a povie, ze chce skoncit ale chce si este docerpat nahradky, proces by mal byt taky, ze sa s nim dohodnete na "vypovednej dobe" napriklad dva tyzdne/mesiac a na koniec tejto doby naplanujete zrusenie registracie a to da zakaznikovi cas vycerpat si nahradne hodiny.

Planujeme este dorobit pauznutie registracie - Cize prerusenie na nejaku dobu alebo na neurcito. Rovnalo by sa to zruseniu len s tym rozdielom, ze sa neskor znova aktivuje takato registracia a opat sa zacne pouzivat. Je to ale trochu komplikovanejsi proces takze to musime najskor dobre premysliet.

Co mi este napada, je ze by mohla byt moznost pri ruseni registracie skonvertovat nahradne hodiny na terminy zadarmo a to by dalo zakaznikovi moznost pracovat s nahradkami aj po zruseni registracie.

tento mesiac nastala zmena ktorej celkom nerozumiem... detom nabehne mesaƒçn√° uhrada¬†a svieti im na zeleno emonikon zaplatn√© a namiesto toho ako doteraz nejaku t√Ω ƒço e≈°te nezaplatili oran≈æov√©ho emotikona¬†a ƒçiastoƒçne uhrane ale zelen√©ho a ≈æe ƒçak√° sa na platbu, a tak isto ich nem√°me v neuhraden√Ωch registr√°ci√°ch je to zm√§toƒçn√©, preƒço tak√°to nevy≈æiadan√° zmena nastala?

Dobry den,

Tato zmena je v systeme uz zhruba tri mesiace. Plati iba pri vopred naplanovanych platbach. Urobili sme ju prave na zaklade ziadosti od Vas nasich zakaznikov. 

Ide o to, ze pred zmenou Zooza automaticky po vygenerovani dlznej sumy oznacila registraciu ako neuhradenu. To znemoznovalo oddelit od seba ludi, ktori realne nezaplatili za kurz (a teda boli po datume splatnosti) od tych, ktorym este datum splatnosti neuplynul a stavalo sa, ze aj takito klienti dostavali od zakaznikov pripomienky o uhrade.

Co tato zmena teda priniesla?

- V momente, kedy sa vytvori nova naplanovana platba a prida sa dlzna suma na registraciu klienta sa jeho registracia prepne do stavu Caka sa na uhradu

- V den, kedy ma platba datum splatnosti a registracia nie je uhradena sa preklopi do stavu Neuhradena

- Z pohladu Vas ako administratora systemu, mate jasne oddelenych neplaticov od ludi, ktori platia nacas.

- Z pohladu klienta mu v jeho profile nesvieti cerveny oznam, ze nezaplatil, ale menej agresivna informacia o tom, ze cakame na jeho platbu.

- Registracie v stave Caka sa na uhradu si samozrejme mozete vyfiltrovat podla prislusneho stavu v zozname registracii.

Verim, ze tato zmena pomoze k jasnejsej komunikacii smerom na zakaznikov.

V pripade, ze mate dalsie otazky, nevahajte sa ozvat.

Dakujem a prajem este krasny den.

Alternativne, ak ho chcete aj presunut do inej skupiny, potom mozete celu registraciu jednoducho presunut (z detailu terminu), ale to je komplexnejsi proces a v pripade skusobnej hodiny mozno zbytocny.

Len ako poznamka - mozete zakaznika pridat aj na tri terminy, skusobna lekcia sa potom ukonci az po poslednom z nich.

Dobry den Michal,

skuste vybrat nahradnu hodinu teraz. Nejake by sa uz ponukat mali. Nakoniec sme zistili, ze problem nebol v nastaveni ale prave v tych blokoch. Pre skusobne hodiny tam nebola vynimka ohladom blokov a ta zamedzila tomu aby sa bloky na ktorych pouzivatel nie je prihlaseny dalo prihlasit.

Dobry den pan Kiss,

Ano ta oprava fungovala globalne pre vsetky kurzy avsak tak ako som spominal na stretnuti, musi byt na danom mieste aj volna kapacita. Kazdopadne preverime to este, ako sa to chova. Poslete prosim cislo Vasej testovacej registracie?

[SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Dobry den,

nahradne hodiny je mozne presunut do dalsieho fakturacneho obdobia (vo Vasom ponimani do dalsieho trimestra) podla nastavenia ci uz na kurze alebo vo vseobecnych nastaveniach nahradnych hodin.

Aktualne mate povolene nahradne hodiny len pre kurz LegoTech II, ostatne kurzy ponukaju moznost odhlasit sa z hodiny, avsak narok na nahradnu hodinu mu nevznikne - nastavenie na kurze ma nahradne hodiny vypnute.¬†

Co mozete urobit je nasledovne:

1. vo vseobecnych nastaveniach si nastavit nahradne hodiny podla Vasich potrieb https://zooza.app/#settings/replacements

kde mate 3 moznosti - preniest nahradne hodiny , platnost nahradnych hodin vyprsi na konci skupiny (aktualne nastavenie) alebo platnost vyprsi po uplynuti poctu dni.

Prva a tretia moznost su jedine, ktore funguju aj v dalsich skupinach, je len na Vas, ktora z nich Vam viac vyhovuje.

2. na kurzoch, na ktorych chcete, aby mali klienti moznost si vybrat nahradnu hodinu, spustit nastavenie - prikladam link na Legotech I ako priklad:

https://zooza.app/#courses/8418/settings?edit=replacements

Toto nastavenie je potrebne nastavit pre kazdy kurz.

3. Vzhladom na nastavenie nemate aktualne ziadne platne a nevyuzite kredity typu nahradna hodina, od septembra sa Vam vsak 67 krat odhlasili klienti. Pokial tymto klientom chcete vytvorit kredit, mozete im manualne pre kazdeho vytvorit volny termin. Po zapnuti nahradnych hodin na kurze sa spatne nahradne hodiny nevytvaraju, toto nastavenie vzdy zacne platit len od doby zapnutia pre dalsie odhlasenia.

Podrobnejsie informacie o nahradnych hodinach si viete precitat aj v tomto manuali:\

https://support.zooza.online/portal/sk/kb/articles/nastavenie-nahradnych-hodin

V pripade dalsich budeme radi, ked nas budete znova kontaktovat.

Prajem pekn√Ω de≈à.

*|IF:HAS_ONLINE_MEETING|*

subject: Rola - Asisten
classification: Issue - Requirement to test a set up

threads.content:
Dobry vecer, ospravedlnujem sa za neskorsiu odpoved:

1) Moznosti dochadzky prisiel/neprisiel

Toto urcuje nastavenie v pristupoch. Tam viete nastavit ci lektori maju spravovat dochadzku kompletne alebo len obmedzene. Asistent sice nie je lektor, ale v tomto pripade je medzi nich zaradeny takze sa riadi tymto pravidlom. Ak Vam to ale nevyhovuje, nevidim dovod preco by sme to nemohli upravit. Realisticky vzate ma byt asistent prava ruka administratora takze dava zmysel aby mal plnu spravu dochadzky za kazdych okolnosti.

2) Nemoznost parovat platby

V principe je to "by design". Asistent je od Majitela odliseny najma tym, ze nemoze pracovat s timom (manazovat tim) a spravovat platby.

3) Nemoznost spravovat sadzby

Podobne ako pri predoslej odpovedi, nemoznost manazovat tim je jedna z odlisujucich vlastnosti asistenta od majitela. Tu ide o to aby asistent nemohol svojvolne zmenit sadzbu lektora a tym mu znizit odmenu. Samotny fakt ze odmenu vidi (v reporte) problem nie je, lebo moze prave pripravovat napriklad podklady na fakturaciu, ale nemal by mat pravo menit vysku odmeny.

V principe boli role navrhnute ako archetypy toho s cim sa stretavame bezne vo firmach. Ale zivot prinasa kadeco a kazdy funguje trosku inak. Aj preto su v aplikacii rozne moznosti prisposobenia si jednotlivych roli (ako napriklad aj sposob zadavania dochadzky). Preto ak Vam dava zmysel pre vasich asistentov povolit im pristup k platbam, vieme to do aplikacie doplnit aby tam takato moznost bola.

Momentalne chystame upravu v tychto bodoch:

- Moznost povolit/zakazat jednotlivym lektorskym roliam pristup k platbam (zalozka platby)

- Moznost priradit hlavnemu lektorovi (individualne) jednotlive kurzy (teda napriklad vidi Anglictinu, ale nevidi Nemcinu)

Ahoj Veronika,

na zaklade nasej predchadzajucej komunikacii ohladom taborov na jar 2026 a nasledne leto 2026 sme sa dohodli, ze sa interne rozhodnete, ako chcete riesit moznost nakupu produktu na Vasom webe.

Obdrzali sme od Vas poziadavku na skontaktovanie sa s Vasim webarom, s ktorym komunikoval Martin.

Vystup z telefonatu je:
Vas webar je pripraveny prepojit Zoozu s Vasim zakladnym webom mybrainacademy.sk
ak som dobre rozumela, ponuka je nahodena, pripravena v systeme na zviditelnenie na webe.

Tu su dve moznosti:
- ponuka moze byt viditelna ako aj zvysok Vasej ponuky, pod student.mybrainacademy, ako je to aj pre klasicku vyuku, cize v zobrazeni, ktore poznate uz teraz, s tym ze prelink pod tlacidlom tabory bude¬†
¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†- v tomto rieseni netreba developovat nic nove, staci prelinkovat tlacidlo s existujucou strankou¬†

- ponuka moze byt viditelna s filtraciou iba na ponuku taborov, pod student.mybrainacademy, tak, ze ked pride klient na Vasu zakladnu stranku, klikne na tlacidlo Tabory, presunie sa na student.mybrainacademy ale len do vyfiltrovanej sekcie tabory pre vsetky lokality, ktore budu dostupne. 
¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†- toto riesenie si vyzaduje developersky zasah, zostavenie filtracie a jasnu strukturu, tak ako to mate spravene pre klasicku ponuku pri rocnych kurzoch - takyto developersky zasah je schopny spravit aj Vas webar, hoci nie je oboznameny s tym, ako je dana struktura spravena alebo to moze byt v rezii Zooza timu, kde hodinova sadzba pre tento ukon je 60EUR bez DPH. Predpokladany potrebny cas na vyhotovenie riesenia z nasej strany je 1 hodina
¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†

V pripade, ze si vyberiete druhu moznost a budete pozadovat, aby sme danu filtraciu pripravili my, sme schopni dodat vyhotovenie do jedneho pracovneho dna od potvrdenia.

Prosim o potvrdenie, ktora z moznosti je pre Vas schodna, aby sme nasledne ked tak vedeli, ci odovzdavat dokumentaciu na spracovanie Vasmu webarovi, alebo ci si mame vyclenit kapac... [TRUNCATED]

threads.content:
Dobry den,

vsetky emaily boli odoslane korektne. Za vsetky posielam jeden printscreen v prilohe. Technicky to funguje tak, ze od nas zo systemu vzdy odchadzaju emaily v podobe sablony a k nej su pribalene dynamicke znacky. Emaily odosielame cez Mailchimp (a jeho sluzbu Mandrill) a preto u nas kazdy email ukladame v podobe bez vyplnenych znaciek. Po odoslani nam Mailchimp posle naspat co v skutocnosti odoslal. Niekedy to trva minutku, inokedy to moze trvat aj den. Je to v zavislosti od vytazenia Mailchimpu. Kazdopadne tu uz preslo velmi vela casu a stale nemame v systeme fyzicke kopie odoslanych emailov z Mailchimpu. Nie su tam zaznamenane ani ziadne vypadky ani nic, takze nerozumiem preco u nas tie emaily nie su. Skusime sa na to pozriet, ci je to otazka toho jedneho dna alebo je to nieco co sa pravidelnejsie opakuje a skusime kontaktovat Mailchimp, nech nam k tomu daju vyjadrenie.

Kazdopadne, mozem Vas uistit, ze emaily odisli zakaznikom v poriadku.

Dobry den Michal,

1) kopirovanie registracii

Pozerali sme sa do logov a rozdiel je sposobeny chybou na nasej strane. Jeden z blokov sa napocital dva krat, preto ten rozdiel v cene. Chybu sme opravili a uz sa nebude opakovat. Je potrebne vojst do registracie a upravit dlznu sumu manualne na 208 eur.

2) uhrady

Na jednej registracii vidite vsetky uhrady k tejto registracii. Cize napriklad ak by Vam klient zaplatil teraz za januar na registraciu, ktora patri do januaroveho kurzu tak to uvidite. Ale dam priklad co sa moze stavat:

Mate registraciu c. 1. na jesen. Klient ju uhradi a chce pokracovat dalej. Vytvorite registraciu c. 2. na zimu. Klient ale omylom zaplati na registraciu c.1 a nie na registraciu c. 2. V tomto pripade mozete platbu z registracie c. 1. presunut do registracie c. 2.

3) notifikacie

Notifikacie sa riadia nastavenim na kurze. Tam momentalne mate zadane, ze sa maju odosielat 15 dni po registracii. Z pohladu systemu je jedno, kedy registracia vznikla. Cize pre registracie, ktore ste vytvarali 16. decembra by sa notifikacie mali odoslat 31. decembra.

Dobry den Mirka,

verim, ze sa Vam pocas sviatkov dari oddychovat, tesit sa s rodinami a nacerpavat energiu do buduceho roku, ktory verim bude uspesny a vsetkych nas posunie vpred.

Dakujeme Vam za stretnutie, kde sme poniektori mali moznost nie len Vas spoznat osobne, ale aj sme prebrali vela dolezitych otazok a bodov, ktore nam pomozu k zlepseniu nasej spoluprace a pochopenia sa navzajom.

Rovnako tak dakujem za zaslanie vyrocnej spravy a zhrnutie bodov, ktore sme si spolu presli aj s ich statusom. Pre vsetky body, ktore potrebuju svoj dalsi posun, z vysvetlenia sa dostat k realizacii, sme tu pre Vas.
Tak ako sme si povedali, biznisove rozhodnutia su na Vas, my ich podporime z technickej strany tak, aby bol vysledok nie len pouzivatelsky prijemny ale hlavne uzitocny pre vas rast a dennu pracu.

Rada by som nadviazala par bodmi aj z nasej strany:

1. reporting - RAW data - komunikacia medzi Katkou Krskovou a Veronikou Muranyiovou prebieha vlastnym kanalom - dievcata si dohodnu spolocne stretnutie, kde zadefinuju vsetky dolezite metriky, ktore v reporte potrebuju manazeri, pre spravne moznosti fakturacie smerom k MBA a rovnako tak kontrole pobocky pre jej zveladovanie
2. Network report - na datach pracujeme, budeme priebezne odovzdavat nase vystupy k dalsiemu nahliadnutiu a pripadnym upravam tak, aby tento typ reportu daval zmysel pre siete

3. presun registracii z OFFLINE do ONLINE - planujeme v Q1/26 spravit funkcionalitu, ktora dovoli adminom presuvat registracie medzi francizami vramci jednej siete.

4. Hodnotenie pokroku deti - budeme ocakavat Vas biznisovy pohlad, ako Vam dava zmysel, aby funkcionalita fungovala, co by ste potrebovali dosiahnut a ako si predstavu... [TRUNCATED]

Ahoj Veronika,

kontrolujem tvoj senecky ucet a nastavenia su tam nasledovne:

- vyrocie clenskeho, teda datum splatnosti splatky je k 1.dnu v mesiaci

- vytvorenie splatky mate nastavene 20 dni pred splatnostou, teda 10 alebo 11 den v predchadzajucom mesiaci (podla dlzky daneho mesiaca)

- nultu notifikaciu - teda notifikaciu o tom, ze bude vytvorena splatka, mate nastavenu 1 den pred vytvorenim splatky.¬†

V realite to znamena:
- 9.9. dostavam prvu info (bude Vam vytvorena splatka na oktober). 

- 10.9. dostanem druhu spravu, ze je mi vytvorena splatka za oktober

- 1.10. je splatka za oktober splatna, o com dostavam email, ze nemam uhradene do dnesneho dna.

Zooza neposiela zakaznikom spravy po splatnosti, takyto typ upomienok system nepodporuje, nedaju sa nastavit.

Pri nastavovani, aj pri kontrole dat sme si prechadzali tym, preco mate nastavene vyrocie clenskych poplatkov k 1.dnu v mesiaci a nie az k 10.dnu, co je zaroven aj splatnost.
Rozumieme, ze teraz mate interne nastavenie, ze splatka ma byt splatna v 10.den v predchadzajucom mesiaci, toto nastavenie, ktore teraz mat bolo odsuhlasene Mirkou po tom, ako sme si presli na vypoctoch z excelu, co to znamena, ak to bude inak.

To, nad cim uvazujeme je dostat do systemu notifikaciu po splatnosti, nastavovanu poctom dni na zaklade Vasich preferencii.

Postup, ktory mate momentalne zvoleny je najlepsia mozna cesta systemu, aby dosiahol co najblizsie nastavenia tomu, ako to funguje u Vas v realite.
V nastaveniach by som nateraz nemenila nic zasadne, az na nultu notifikaciu, ktora chodi jeden den pred vystavenim realnej splatky a teda aj dalsou notifikaciou. Moze to byt pre klienta zahlcujuce dostavat 2 maily za sebou na rovnaku emu

Rovnako tak, ked pribudne notifikacia PO splatnosti, ktoru pripravujeme, treba, aby ste si navolili take rozpatie dni, aby sa Vam nestavalo, ze sa Vam budu krizit spravy.
Teda, ak mi pride nulta a prva pripomienka tych 20 dni pred splatnostou, potom budem mat k 1.dnu v mesiaci splatnost... [TRUNCATED]

subject: Payment reminder
classification: Issue - Requirement to test a set up

threads.content:
Dear Bianca,

actually we're working on this for quite some time and this should be resolved in upcoming weeks. Although it seems to be an easy change, it really required us to rework whole payment scheduling process so it took some time to build it. However, these notifications should then start arriving between 9 and 10 am.

There are three notifications about payments that Zooza sends:

- Notify before a scheduled payment is issued (this is optional notification and can be turned off in settings > payments)

- Notify when a scheduled payment is issued

- Notify after a scheduled payment due date has passed and payment has not been made

If you meant the first notification, that can be turned off in settings > payments. The other two cannot be turned off unfortunately.

With [SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Thank you for your response. Please let me know when the change is made so I can communicate accordingly with my clients.¬†

All the best,¬†

Bianca¬†

actually we're working on this for quite some time and this should be resolved in upcoming weeks. Although it seems to be an easy change, it really required us to rework whole payment scheduling process so it took some time to build it. However, these notifications
 should then start arriving between 9 and 10 am.

There are three notifications about payments that Zooza sends:

- Notify before a scheduled payment is issued (this is optional notification and can be turned off in settings > payments)

- Notify when a scheduled payment is issued

- Notify after a scheduled payment due date has passed and payment has not been made

If you meant the first notification, that can be turned off in settings > payments. The other two cannot be turned off unfortunately.

Dobry den Barbora,

system ponuka pre taketo situacie moznost prihlasit registraciu na konkretny termin v inej skuppine/kurze cez dochadzku.

Najdite si Luckinu primarnu registraciu, ktorou by chodila na 3 terminy inych kurzov, otvorte si jej dochadzku, cez detail registracie a navrchu obrazovky najdete tlacidlo pridat na termin.
Nasledne si v nom zvolite ktory kurz, aky termin a Lucku s jej primarnou registraciou prihlasite jednorazovo na terminy, kam potrebujete.

Verim, ze tato funkcionalita je presne to, co pre situaciu ktoru opisujete vyuzijete.

V pripade potreby sa kludne este ozvite.

Dobry den Michal,

Ano, momentalne nieco taketo v aplikacii nemame. Co navrhujem urobit je - povolime registraciu na skusobnu hodinu aj ludom mimo vekoveho rozsahu - cize neskoncia v poradovniku. Nasledne ked svoju hodinu absolvuju, vzdy po poslednej skusobnej hodine sa Vas aplikacia opyta, kde ma zakaznik pokracovat (v ktorej skupine) a v tomto kroku by ste bud ponechali aktualnu skupinu (ak vekovy rozdiel nie je velky) alebo jej jednoducho vyberiete inu skupinu. Myslim, ze takto by to mohlo byt v poriadku a vyhneme sa tak krkolomnemu stavu - poradovnik na skusobnu hodinu:) Co vy na to?

Tu registraciu sme prehodili na platnu skusobnu hodinu takze uz nie je v poradovniku a je normalne v procese zahrnuta tak ako standardna registracia na skusobnu hodinu.

Vsetko dobre aj Vam do noveho roka, nech rastiete:)

Hi Peter,
first of all, I would like to wish you all the best in the new year ‚Äì good health, peace of mind, and many successes in everything you take on.
We wanted to briefly reach out in connection with our collaboration. Our goal is for the system to gradually make your work easier and help reduce administrative tasks through automations.
We can see that you have gone through the initial setup and that your courses and groups are already in place. At the same time, we understand that the system is not yet fully integrated into your work with clients.
As the second semester is approaching and starts in February, this can be a great opportunity to prepare the system in advance so that it can fully support you during this transition and throughout the upcoming period.
We would love to understand if there is anything currently holding you back from using the system more actively or from introducing it to your clients. We are more than happy to help ‚Äî whether by clarifying specific points, fine-tuning the setup, or walking through the next steps together.
Our aim is for the system to work in your favor and bring you real value.
Please let us know how we can best support you.

subject: A quick check-in on your next steps

threads.content:
Dear Marius,

first of all, I would like to wish you all the best in the new year ‚Äì good health, peace of mind, and many successes in everything you take on.

we wanted to briefly reach out following the start of our collaboration.
We can see that you are already actively using the system and that your clients are set up, which is a great foundation. We simply wanted to check in and see whether there is anything we could help you with at this stage ‚Äî whether it‚Äôs support with decision-making, system settings, or preparing and launching new products.
The system offers several ways to support the growth of your business, and we‚Äôd be happy to help you choose and set up the options that make the most sense for you.
If you have any questions, would like to walk through certain topics, or just want to discuss next steps, we‚Äôre here for you.
Please let us know how we can best support you.

Dobry den Michal,

Nie, zmena ceny sa viaze vzdy len na nove registracie. Je potrebne si uvedomit, ze skusobna hodina je samostatna registracia. Napriklad ak by sa klient registroval v case, kedy je cena kurzu 10 eur. Nasledne zmenite cenu kurzu na 20 eur a zakaznik sa pride po skusobnej hodine registrovat, cena jeho kurzu uz bude 20 eur.

Kazdopadne tato akcia, ktoru popisujete by sa do buducnosti dala vyriesit nasledovne:

Manualne:

- Vytvorite klientovi kredit na jeho skusobnej registracii vo vyske zlavy

- Zakaznik si tento kod najde vo svojom profile a moze ho uplatnit pri registracii do celeho kurzu.

Automatizovane:¬†

- Pri registracii do skusobnej hodiny by si zakaznik zaroven zakupil produkt so zlavovym kodom, ktory mu pride samostatne v emaily

- Opat si zakaznik tento kod pouzije/uplatni pri registracii do celeho kurzu.

Zooza si v principe nepamata historiu cien a nevie zakaznikovi "garantovat" cenu v tomto zmysle. To co ale robi je, ze kazdy zakaznik, ktory sa registruje do kurzu dostane cenu platnu v case registracie a tato sa nasledne sama od seba nikdy nezmeni (iba ak ju zmeni admin, alebo si zakaznik vytvori novu registraciu).

subject: Potrebujem pochopi≈•
classification: Issue - Requirement to test a set up

threads.content:
Ahoj Veronika,

podla toho, co vidim na prehlade splatok, najvacsi zmatok vznikol tym, ze splatky boli nastavene podla vseobecnych nastaveni, ktore hovorili, ze vyrocie splatky ma byt 10. dna v mesiaci.
toto nastavenie bolo robene Vami, zmenene po tom, co sme si spolu povedali, ze to ma byt k 1.dnu v mesiaci.

Rozumiem, ze tym padom vzniklo o jednu splatku navyse, pretoze za oktober sa registraciam vytvorili dve splatku - jedna alikvotna a jedna plna (vo vasom pripade alikvota znamena plna suma).
Tak zakaznici preplatili svoje registracie o jednu splatku.
Zakaznici Vam uhradzali sumu podla tohto nastavenia.
Teraz, po tom, ako ste si znova aktivovali splatkove kalendare kvoli vyrociu k prvemu dnu v mesiaci by sumy mali uz sediet.
V den, kedy si to menila sa dane splatkove kalendare prenastavili a data sa upravili aj na tych kalendaroch, kde januarove splatky boli sice vytvorene, ale nie spracovane, k polnoci.

Kontrolovala som namatkovo skontrolovala niektore registracie a hoci su preplatene, tak ich sumy by uz teraz mali sediet s realitou dlhov, ktore im maju byt vystavene.

vdaka za trpezlivost a zelam pekny vikend

riesili¬†sme vzniknutu¬†situaciu s kolegynou¬†Katkou, ktora vam pisala povodny mail. (ked¬†prazdmniny¬†boli) a tieto prazdniny automaticky preskocil, napriek tomu ze tieto nastavenia uz nemal mat. Podla mna by sa toto urcite¬†dalo zo strany programatora doriesit¬†, ze ked je moznost zmenit pocas kurzu den a cas vyuky aby tam bola aj opat moznost preskocit sviatky a prazdniny. Kedze v pripade kurzov je uplne bezne, ze moze nastat situacia, ze pocas kurzu je potrebne zmenit den vyuky. A potom je velmi¬†pracne taketo kurzy kontrolovat, ci sa zvysne terminy preplanovali¬†spravne a ci sa tam nenechadza¬†nejaky¬†sviatok alebo prazdniny. subject: Automaticke parovanie 0latieb nie vzdy dobre ide-polrocne platby

threads.content:
Dobry den pan Fedor,

pozrela som sa na niektore prijate platby z JAN26, ktore ste nasledne manualne paroval.
napriklad:¬†https://zooza.app/#registrations/403667/payments?cash_payment=1239292
V danom zhrnuti mozte vidiet, ze parovanie sa zastavilo na procese Parovat len platby k nezaplatenym objednavkam.

Vase nastavenia, ktore mate spravene na platbach hovoria, ze platby sa maju automaticky sparovat iba vtedy, ak je na registracii dlh.
https://zooza.app/#settings/payment_settings

V tomto pripade dlh registracie bol ku dnu prijatia platby nulovy a preto platba ostala neuhradena.
Nova splatka pre registraciu sa vytvorila az 13.1., cize o den neskor ako peniaze do systemu prisli.

Dakujem
Katarina

Jaj, cize ked to ludia zaplatia hned ako dostanu prikaz, tak to jesparuje, chapem. Da sa teda nastavit dakde aby to vytvaralo dlh nie 2 alebo 3 dni po odoslani, ale hned pri odoslani? Nema zmysel to mat neskor, lebo vela ludi plati obratom a potom nefunguje
 apparovanie ako vidime.¬†

A ono by to potom dodatocne samo doparovalo dnes?¬†

Dobry den pan Fedor,

pozrela som sa na niektore prijate platby z JAN26, ktore ste nasledne manualne paroval.

napriklad:¬†https://zooza.app/#registrations/403667/payments?cash_payment=1239292

V danom zhrnuti mozte vidiet, ze parovanie sa zastavilo na procese Parovat len platby k nezaplatenym objednavkam.

Vase nastavenia, ktore mate spravene na platbach hovoria, ze platby sa maju automaticky sparovat iba vtedy, ak je na registracii dlh.

https://zooza.app/#settings/payment_settings

V tomto pripade dlh registracie bol ku dnu prijatia platby nulovy a preto platba ostala neuhradena.

Nova splatka pre registraciu sa vytvorila az 13.1., cize o den neskor ako peniaze do systemu prisli.

Dakujem

Katarina

Ak Vam zakaznik zaplati v momente ako dostane prikaz, tak sa jeho platba zaznamena medzi sparovane, v pripade, ze vsetky ostane nalezitosti splna.
Prikaz na platbu totiz odchadza v momente, ako je vytvoreny dlh - den odchodu je nastaveny Vami na zaklade nastaveni Poctu dni pre vystavenie splatky.

Vy vasim klientom odosielate aj notifikaciu pred planovanym vystavenim splatky, momentalne 3 dni pred vystavenim splatky.
Tato sprava zakaznikov iba informuje, ze splatka bude vystavena.
Ak na tento mail zareaguju zaplatenim splatky, uhradia ju skor, ako im vznikne dlh.

Ak si teda ponechate nastavenie sparovania platby iba pre registracie s dlhom a zaroven budete posielat notifikaciu o buducej splatke, moze sa stavat, ze Vam na to budu klienti reagovat ako v pripade registracie 403667

Doparovanie nesparovanych platieb v aplikacii automaticke nie je, je potrebne to spravit manualne, vzhladom na to.

dakujem

Katarina

Ok, takto to ale nefungovalo 3 roky nazad, ked mi to nastavovala vasa kolegyna aby to slo ok. Ako to mam nastavit, aby to fungovalo normalne logicky?¬†

Priklad: 10teho ide von mail xe maju uhradit dalsiu splatku. V tom momente vznika dlh a cokolvek co uhradia neskor po maile sa automaticky sparuje, ak sedi suma a VS.¬†

A hlavne to neodosle upomienku ked to bude sparovane. Co robi teraz

Pan Fedor,

v Zooze si nastavujete na splatkovych sablonach den splatnosti splatky. Na kazdej sablone to mozte mat nastavene inym sposobom, zalezi od Vasich preferencii.

K tomu mate moznost povedat systemu, kolko dni pred splatnostou sa ma splatka vytvorit - nehovorite teda o konkretnom datume vytvorenia splatky - vytvori sa dlh a odosle sa klientovi informacia ze ma vygenerovany dlh a ze ho ma uhradit.

Okrem toho, mate nastavene, ze chcete, aby 3 dni pred vznikom splatky odisiel ludom email, ze im bude coskoro vystavena nova splatka.
https://zooza.app/#settings/payment_settings
Ak tuto notifikaciu odosielat nechcete, odskrtnite tento checkbox

Rovnako tak, ak chcete, aby mali vasi zakaznici moznost Vam poslat peniaze skor ako sa im vytvori dalsia splatka a tym sa dostali do stavu - Preplateny - vypnite si nastavenie o automatickom parovani platby len pre neuhradene registracie.

Co sa tyka odosielania upomienok, pozriem sa na Vas dalsi ticket, predpokladam, ze v nom najdem viac informacii, na zaklade ktorych sa na to budem moct pozriet.
Zooza totiz neodosiela upomienky po splatnosti, iba informaciu v den splatnosti.

Katarina

Ok. Skusim, info o splatke nema chodit klientom co ju uz uhradili a nemaju dlh, logicky.¬†

A kuknite aj tie platby, dalsi ticket. Nevidim detail dlznikov pre zmenu v platbach

email, ktory pride zakaznikovi ked sa mu vytvori splatka je uplne legitimnym emailom, ktory podporuje automatizaciu daneho ukonu.
Ak sa klient rozhodne poslat si platbu este pred vytvorenim dlhu, narusa harmonogram, na ktorom ste sa dohodli.
V pripade, ktory opisujete zakaznikovi vsak prichadza informacia, ze splatka bola vytvorena, avsak jeho dlh uz je uhradeny a jeho vyska je nulova.

Urcite neplanujeme v tomto postupe robit nejake zmeny, vsetky potrebne data ma klient k dispozicii v tomto maily.

Ked upravite data na sablone, aplikuju sa na vsetkych novo vniknutych splatkovych harmonogramoch.
Aplikacia vytvorene harmonogramy do minulosti neupravuje, pretoze splatkove harmonogramy su dohodou medzi vami a zakaznikom, na zaklade ktorej za produkt platia.
Ak chcete, aby sa splatkove harmonogramy zmenili podla novych nastaveni na splatke, po jej uprave, je potrebne ich nanovo aplikovat.

Ak vsak hovorime iba o zmene na notifikacnych mailoch, pred vytvorenim splatky, toto nastavenie staci vypnut, alebo zmenit dlzku dni, na splatkovy harmonogram nema vplyv.

To co oznacujete na danom printscreene kvackou je notifikacia o buducej splatke.
Znamena to, ze nasledujuca platba bude coskoro vystavena. Je to forma notifikacie, o ktorej sme sa rozpravali v tickete predoslom, ktoru mate momentalne nastavenu na 3dni pred vystavenim splatky.
Text tohto mailu hovori, ze poziadavka na uhradu bude vystavena v najblizsich dnoch.

Ak na zaklade tejto notifikacie klient uhradi, a nastavenie systemu hovori, ze platba ma byt sparovana iba k registracii s dlhom, potom tato platba nema kam byt pripisana.

Email, ktory nasledne prisiel klientovi dnes je riadna notifikacia o vytvoreni splatky, ktoru vidi aj vo svojom profile a vy v jeho harmonograme.

vdaka
Katarina

Ja tomu rozumiem, nerozumiem preco to posiela to druhe ludom, co so uz uhradili a system vie, ze to je sparovane, to neni OK. Co hovori mail je jedna vec, to ale skor by malo riesit
 prave pripady, ak to uz uhradil v nejakom medzipriestore a nesparovala sa mu platba, nema sa to pisielat kazdemu. To neni spravne. Ludi to pletie a volaju mi.

¬†

 5 dni a potom mu ma ist automatom, len tym, co neuhradili, pripomienka. Toto je idealny stav, tak by to malo byt. Je to zbytocne prekombinovane a potom to len robi dalsiu robotu a spamuje to klientov takisto. Skuste sa zamysliet and tymto bodom dobuducna,
 keep it simple, but functional. Nech to robi to, co administrator a nas klient od toho asi ocakava.

Hi Steve,
Thanks for your message ‚Äî happy to clarify.
Zooza handles the full booking and programme management flow, including:

registrations and client data

payments and payment status (e.g. stripe > xero in Zooza automation)

capacity limits and availability

attendance tracking and admin overview
This logic all lives in Zooza.
For the visual presentation (programme images, page layout, text content), this is usually handled on your website. Zooza connects to your site via embedded Zooza booking widgets¬†- (calendar view or booking form), which you place into your existing pages.
So in practice:

Your website shows the programme details and images

The Zooza booking widget is embedded into that page

Parents complete registration, payment, and management through Zooza on your website (no redirects, but also no iframes...)
This way, parents stay on your website visually, while Zooza runs everything behind the scenes.
I‚Äôm happy to help you review your current setup and show you how other brands and schools typically handle this. If useful, you can¬†book a short, free call¬†and we‚Äôll guide you based on your specific needs.
[SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Hi Steve,
Just a quick follow-up in case it helps.
You can try the full student/parent booking journey on your test page here:
https://zooza.site/uk/The-Art-School-Chester/register
And if your web admin or developer needs it, the integration documentation is available at:
https://docs.zooza.online
If it‚Äôs easier, we can also run through this together on a short call and confirm the best setup for your website.
Best regards,

threads.content:
Dobry den Peto,

odkonzultovala som situaciu s Martinom.

Za normalnych okolnosti, v pripade, ze chcem presuvat zakaznika z jedneho bloku do druheho, nepotrebujem na to robit presun, ale v dochadzke mu zmenim jeho blok tak, aby sedel podla toho na com sa dohodneme.
Nie je mozne presuvat zakaznika cez funkciu presun vramci jednej skupiny.

Vsimla som si ze pre tuto skupinu nesledujete dochadzku, mate ju vypnutu.
Najjednoduchsim riesenim situacie je, ak si dochadzku zapnete, presuniete klienta a v pripade, ze si dochadzku znovu chcete vypnut, tak to urobite.

Prosim mohli by ste mi dat priklad klienta, ktoreho ste presunuli z bloku do bloku vramci jednej skupiny, aby som sa na to mohla pozriet?

dakujem

Katarina

threads.content:
Hi R√©ka, thanks for your message.
Regarding system emails: could you please confirm which type of email you mean (e.g., login/reset password, registration confirmations, notifications)? Also, please check Spam/Promotions/Updates folders, as emails sometimes end up there.

Regarding sending emails to groups for online teaching: you can send bulk messages to clients from Zooza. Here is the guide:

https://support.zooza.online/portal/en/kb/articles/sending-email-sms-to-clients#Sending_messages

You can also send messages from filtered lists of groups or registrations.
If you tell us:

the email address you expect the messages to arrive to, and

roughly when you last expected an email,
we can check the delivery logs on our side.
Best regards,

threads.content:
Dobry den,

vzhladom na to, ze zakaznik neprisiel do druheho polroku cez registracny formular ale vykopirovali ste ho z minuleho polroku, nevyberal si formu platby, teda splatkovu sablonu, ktorou by urcil, ze chce platit jednorazovo so zlavou alebo na splatky.

Po tom, co ste registracie vykopirovali ste mu tuto splatkovu sablonu neaktivovali, preto cena, ktoru system vypocital bola zakladna cena 190 czk x pocet terminov.
V pripade, ze chcete registracie manualne do skupin doplnit kopirovanim alebo manualnym zadanim novej registracie a chcete aby takito zakaznici mali pridelenu splatkovu sablonu, je potrebne ich manualne na registracii aplikovat.

V momente ako toto spravite, zakaznikovi sa zaktivuje platobny plan.

Aplikovat splatkove sablony dokazete bud jednotlivcom alebo hromadne celej skupine, ak si to niekde takto zelate mat nastavene.

vzhladom na to, ze momentalne mate obe registracie daneho klienta preplatene, mate moznost mu cast platby refundovat naspat alebo mu v hodnote zlavy poskytnut zlavovy kupon, ktory pouzije pri dalsej registracii na novy kurz.

Ak by ste chceli peniaze zakaznikovi vratit, mate moznost v systeme spravit aj ciastkovu refundaciu a tak si aj administrativne zapisat, ze ste takuto transakciu urobili - peniaze sa vsak zakaznikovi vykonanim tejto akcie nevratia z vasho uctu automaticky, nakolko boli prijate prevodom a nie online cez platobnu branu.

dakujem za pochopenie.

Katarina

threads.content:
Posielam foto podƒæa dohody.
VS registr√°cie: 454553 - Nikola Li≈°kov√°

Dobry den pan Straska,

splatkova sablona sa momentalne vyratava z poctu terminov, ktore su pred klientom, nie za nim, hoci prvu splatku dokazete nastavit od zaciatku skupiny.

Znamena to, ze system vypocitava 3 fixne splatky od 20.1.2026, odkedy bol klient zaregistrovany.
V tomto konkretnom pripade to teda znamena 11 terminov, rozdelenych na 4+4+3 terminy, preto druha a tretia splatka vychadzaju nie na 9.2 a 9.3 ale o tyzdne neskor.
na to, aby system dokazal spracovavat terminy aj spatne, do terminu pred registraciou je potrebny zasah developera a vyvoj funkcionality na splatkovych harmonogramoch.

Co dokazete momentalne spravit je pouzit fixnu splatkovu sablonu na 3 splatky a nasledne, po jeho vygenerovani zmenit datumy priamo na registracii v harmonograme platieb pre 2 a 3 splatku.
Alebo vyuzit iny typ splatkovej sablony, napriklad mesacnu frekvenciu, kde urcite den, kedy ma byt splatka splatna - napriklad na 9.den v mesiaci. + nastavite alikvotu na Celu sumu a rozdelite alikvotu od prvej plnej splatky, tak ako sme si to ukazovali na poslednom online hovore.

v pripade, ze vyvinieme funkcionalitu, ktora dovoli splatkovej sablone aby brala do uvahy pocet terminov vratane toho pred registraciou, v pripade, ze si to tak zvolite na nastaveni, budeme Vas informovat.

dakujem

Katarina

Dobry den pani Bajerova,

nahradne hodiny pre nasledujuce kurzy sa nezobrazuju, pretoze skupiny este nezacali.
System spristupnuje moznost nahlasit sa na nahradnu hodinu do skupiny ktora este nezacala az 4 dni pred jej zaciatkom, prave kvoli kapacite, ktoru by Vam takto mohli zabrat nahradne hodiny namiesto riadne platiacich klientov, ktori by sa prihlasili na cele trvanie kurzu.

Nahradne hodiny sa teda Vasim klientom zobrazia v case 4 dni pred zaciatkom skupiny z druheho polroku, co je uz o par dni.

Dakujem

Katarina

Hi Viorica,
Thank you for the clarification,,,you are right. We can confirm this was an issue: after accepting the GDPR terms, the system could loop back to the same screen and not open the profile.
This could happen mainly for parent accounts that were created via import (older records, e.g., from 2024). We have now refreshed the affected records on our side, so it should work for you and for other parents with the same type of account.
Could you please try again now? Thank you,

Dobry den, Veronika,¬†

potrebujeme viac detailov, ktorej registracie sa to tyka.¬†

Funkcionalitu sme otestovali a pozreli sa na par registracii a pristup sa im nijakym sposobom neblokuje.

Moze ist o lokalny problem u klienta. Pockame na viac detailov a pozrieme sa na to.

Dobry den, dakujeme za odpoved, vidime, ze ste klientom viacerych fransiz, je potrebne prejst vsetky tie consenty k nim prisluchajuce a odoslat, v strukture tej stranky a consentov nevidime ziadne obmedzenie. Hypoteza je, ze niektore consenty neboli oznacene. Prosim skuste este raz oznacit vsetky tie checkboxy. Potvrdte. AK to neprejde zaslite presny aj cas kedy ste sa o to pokusali. Presli by sme logy.¬† Dakujeme

Ahoj Michal,

Ked vidis registracny formular na stranke vykresleny viac ako jeden krat znamena to, ze rovnaky kod zbieha na tej danej stranke viac krat. Ci sa zobrazuje dva alebo tri ci styri krat uz nehra rolu. Staci aby zbehol viac ako raz a vysledok mozu byt kludne aj tri formulare.

Cize zaklad je pustat registracny formular iba jeden krat per stranka. Pokial pouzivas nas WP plugin tak ten funguje tak, ze na spodok kazdej stranky, ktoru urcis v nastaveniach widgetu vlozi automaticky prislusny formular. Ak teda v nastaveniach widgetu urcis, ze registracny formular bude na stranke Registracia - na tuto stranku uz neumiestnuj ziadny dalsi formular vo forme embed kodu alebo shortcodu.

Samotny plugin na funkcnost zoozy nema ziadny vplyv. Je urceny pre minimalisticku integraciu Zoozy na web a automatizuje zosynchronizovanie URL odkazov (teda ked nastavis registracny formular na stranku Registracia - plugin to posle do zoozy a zmeni nastavenie widgetu tak aby smeroval na tuto stranku).

Ak teda chces pokrocilejsiu integraciu - filtrovanie kurzov atd, nepotrebujes na to plugin, vystacis si bud s tym konfiguratorom, ktory mame priamo v appke, alebo potom mozes preluskat dokumentaciu na https://docs.zooza.online,¬†kde su popisane uplne vsetky moznosti customizacie.

Prosim posli kod, ktorym vkladas predfiltrovany kalendar do stranky a pozriem sa na to, ci je chyba v implementacii, alebo dokumentacii.

Zaroven, dali sme do semi-verejnej prevadzky ten novy profil, co som ti spominal pred vianocami. Da sa zapnut v nastaveniach profiloveho widgetu, zatial sme to neroloutovali globalne. Ak si to chces vyskusat bez toho aby to videli zakaznici, vyrob si v appke novy widget, na tom si to zapni (v nastaveniach profilu) a embedni si tento novy widget na nejaku skrytu stranku na webe.

Dakujem

Martin

Hi,¬†

I am just trying to get past the first step of registration to check your site out and see if it works for my school and it keeps giving me error messages...¬†

Iliana

Hi Iliana,
Thanks for letting us know,,, and sorry about the trouble.

We had a temporary outage on the account creation service, which caused the error messages. It‚Äôs now resolved, and your account has been created successfully.

You can log in using this email address here: https://zooza.app/

Once you‚Äôre in, you‚Äôll see the onboarding option directly on the dashboard.

If you‚Äôd like, we can also do a quick free onboarding/orientation call to help you check whether Zooza fits your school and how to set it up in a minutes :).

Thanks again for your patience, and feel free to reply here if anything still looks off.
[SIGNATURE_REMOVED]

Thanks for responding.¬†

Just a quick question before I dive in.¬†

Our music school students purchase a 10 lesson package. Most are consistent and come in weekly, but there‚Äôs a lot of students that come in on random days of the week depending on their and their teachers schedule which often changes, so we count their lessons out of 10 and usually reach out to them when they reach 9/10 lessons for payment for the next cycle of 10 lessons.¬†

1) Is your site able to sign our existing students on 10 lesson package?¬†

2) Is your site capable of sending out automatic texts or email to parents when they reach 9/10 or is that something we have to do on our end?¬†

Cheers,¬†

Iliana

Dear Iliana,

Thank you for your questions. 

If I understand you correctly then your first question is regarding importing current customers into Zooza. We do have import function (Clients > Clients > Import). However you would need to set up the prices for each of them individually. Unfortunately system can't transfer any existing payments or lesson packages from other software.

As for your second question:
At this time we do not fully support this hybrid model. Here's what the system can do:

1) Everyone attends based on the calendar - meaning that customer books to a class and then follows its calendar on a regular basis.

2) Everyone attends on the terms of their choosing - meaning that customers buys a package of X sessions and then via the customer portal they book themselves to the individual sessions.

3) Version of option 1 with postponed payments based on attendance. Typically everyone pays in advance, but we do have an option to issue payments after a number of sessions attended which would mean that customers would be paying after they attended 10 sessions in your case.

Currently there's no automatic reminder that your purchased package is about to expire but I'm pretty sure we can add this into the roadmap and deliver that to you so that you don't have to do those manually anymore. I'm sure this would be welcome feature for other customers as well.

The problem I see is with the hybrid model. It is not the first time we heard this, however it is not common as it makes the cash flow somewhat unpredictable and hard to manage. What I'd suggest is to perhaps give it a quick call where you would explain the model in closer detail and perhaps we'll be able to figure something out.

Please let me know if you would be keen on exploring this together or if you have other questions.

thank you for your thoughtful response.¬†
i have some follow up questions.¬†

1) our company charges a 10 lesson program. our teachers schedule the lessons and put the students in their calendar on a weekly basis. is your system capable of keep track how many lessons out of 10 each student has remaining?¬†

2) students always pay ahead of time. currently they have 30 min (360 for 10 lesson cycle) 45 min (540 for 10 lesson cycle) and 1 hour (720 for 10 lesson cycle) is that able to be managed with your site?¬†

3) there‚Äôs never any postponed payments with our system. i am mostly concerned that the site keeps track of what lesson the student is currently on (5/10 or 6/10) and i can visually see that when looking at the calendar or dashboard.¬†

i understand you‚Äôre not able to send alerts at 9/10, but can I manually do it or do i have to count each student lessons individually. i am already doing that with my system. i wanted something more automated.

Dear Iliana,

1) Yes it can show how many lessons are there remaining per student but this really depend on how the schedule is managed. From your description this looks like teachers book students into sessions week in advance which sounds more like the regular scheduling to me than a version where student freely decide which lesson they want to attend.

2) Yes. We can fully support various package lenghts.

3)¬†Got you :)

As for the alerts - yeah, you can't do that automatically but do not worry about that. As I mentioned should you start using the system we'll add this feature to it so that it is fully automated. In Zooza we cooperate with our customers very closely and they are the main driver of its development.

So to wrap up, previously you stated that:

Many students dont attend regularly and the dates they attend depend on their availability and the teacher's availability.

Then you added:

Teachers are the ones responsible for the calendar. If I understand you correctly then the process is that student contacts teacher and together they set up the calendar for next week and ultimately teacher is responsible for creating the sessions and booking that student onto them.

Where Zooza can help you with that is that we provide fully functional customer portal for you where your customers can book into the sessions if there is available capacity. Session times are pre-set based on teacher's and venue availability. Customers can clearly see how many sessions they have left.

The difference is that customers are responsible to add themselves to the sessions. Teachers don't do that typically although they are allowed to do so.

With the second model that Zooza supports - ongoing classes - there is no support for packages of lessons. Users book typically for term or half term and they pay a fixed price for that term/half term.

I hope this helps.

Hi Vicki-lee,
Thanks ‚Äî I checked everything. Here are the answers point by point:
P1 (red block + blue text)
That red block is the button for moving a client from Trial ‚Üí Full enrolment. (See the picture)
We‚Äôve already adjusted it, and the blue text has been changed to red. Clients will also receive the same action/confirmation by email.
P2 (parent portal options)
Yes ‚Äî that‚Äôs the set of features parents will gradually use in their portal. It helps them navigate faster (registrations, payment history, orders/merch if you use it, replacement classes if you use them, etc.).
P4 (watermark ‚ÄúLovingly supported by Zooza‚Äù)
On the current subscription plan, this watermark cannot be removed.
It becomes removable under the plan that supports a fully custom domain (currently +‚Ç¨100/month).
Also, because Zooza sends certain system emails on your behalf (emails are sent in your behalf but from Zooza domain), we keep this branding on the embedded flow for compliance/traceability reasons.
P5‚ÄìP6 (click takes them back + failed login)
This is caused by your website cookie/consent manager blocking Zooza scripts.
Fix: in your cookie consent manager, add Zooza scripts as Essential, and allowlist:

api.zooza.app (and Zooza JS resources)
If cookies are blocked, the login can fail. Once this is correctly allowlisted, the portal will work reliably and the browser will remember the setting.

Or disable using cookies management.
Two children (how do they enrol both?)
You already have the right setup: parents can use ‚ÄúAdd another person‚Äù to add a second child in the booking form and enrol both.
Note: trial enrolment is intentionally limited to one child in one class.
Registration form upload (sign + submit / download + return)
The tick-box consent during registration is treated as a valid digital acceptance (this is the standard approach).
At the moment, parents cannot upload documents back into the portal themselves. They can download a document, but uploading is handled by you/admin (you can... [TRUNCATED]

the instructor marks attendance each week ‚úÖ
Active clients / lists

A registration is typically considered ‚Äúactive‚Äù when it has future sessions upcoming.
So you can always keep your full client database, and still easily work day-to-day with only the active registrations.

Good morning Vicki-lee,

there is no possibility to delete a client from your database.
Each client can have one of two statuses: active or inactive.
An active client is one who is registered for an ongoing course, has an unused make-up lesson, or has remaining credit that has not yet been used.
You can find more information here:¬†https://support.zooza.online/portal/en/kb/articles/active-inactive-client

That way, you dont loose client details even if they do not attend your courses anymore - you may use them for your marketing communication if needed.

If any other questions, do not hesitate to contact us again
Have a nice day

Katarina

Best practice is usually:

create a separate ‚Äú1:1 / Private Coaching‚Äù programme,

then each child gets their own class with capacity = 1, their own dates/times, and their own payment plan/rate.
Here‚Äôs the step-by-step guide:
